body.p:
48th
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort June 4th 1864
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL

Genl D W Lindsey
Inspector General.
General.

By directions of his Excellency Govr Bramlette, the resignation of Lt Col Chas F. Starling of the 48th Regt E M of Henderson Co is accepted. By the same authority James W Poole is commissioned Colonel of the 48th Regt E M. vice James H. Halloway reisigned, bearing date 4th June 1864.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky

UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, June 4: 1864.
The resignation of the following named Officer is accepted to take effect from this date.

p.hi: Lieut. Colonel. 48: Reg. E. M. Henderson Co F

body.p:
By command of the Governor:
John Boyle

Inspector Genl of Ky.

Rept from Adjt Genl office
June 4th 1864
48th regt E. M. Henderson. Co. appointmt & commission of Col resignation acepted of Lieut Col
By order of his Excellency Gov Bramlette
